```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(here)
devtools::load_all()
library(tidyverse)
library(RefManageR)
RefManageR::BibOptions(
    bib.style = "authoryear",
    first.inits = TRUE,
    style = "markdown",
    max.names = Inf,
    sorting = "ydnt"
    # no.print.fields = NULL
)
cv_data <- read_cv_items() 
bib_items <- read_bib_items() 
rpkgs <- cv::rpackages
```
